text: "Your Child" is a 2000 song by Mary J. Blige and is the fourth and final single from her fourth studio album Mary. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Dance Club Songs charts. ==Versions== #"Your Child" (album version) (5:30) #"Your Child" (Kiyamma Griffin Uptempo mix) (featuring Ghostface) (4:44) #"Your Child" (Kiyamma Griffin's Uptempo mix instrumental) (4:09) #"Your Child" (Chucky Thompson's Late Nite mix) (3:12) #"Your Child" (Junior's Marython mix) (12:05) ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Mary J. Blige songs
title: Your Child
